data.title: Survival [2HAC Volume 11]
data.meta_description:
Survival [2HAC Volume 11] by Various Artists, released 14 July 2020

1. After the War - SERE
2. Croix Baker - By Any Means Necessary
3. MistRiven - These Woods Have Eyes
4. MelonadeM - Memories of a Better Past
5. Jank Hambrams - We Won't Be Coming Back Here
6. HaruMKT - Frozen In Time
7. Abstraction - Survival of the Chillest
8. panegoism - Over the Mountain
9. A-D-D-F_Toxic - I Tried And I Survived
10. [ X ] - Reruns
11. And Then So Clear - Getting Trough Taking Turns
12. OscillatorSink - It Lives With Us
13. ModalModule - Fight to Survive, or Die Trying
14. CP-r - Probably lost in space
15. Huskotron - Always Survive
16. Nazdy Nate - The Wrath Of The Cosmos
17. Rob Pawn - Survive the Jungle
18. Sakunera - Panic
19. Inkedsplat - Sharp Teeth
20. cat planet - tiny boss battle
21. Shanahan Sweet - Theater Mouse
22. Philip Aldous - Cutting Loose a Hive of Killer Wasps Over The Bad Guy's Head
23. Monsieur-Hibou - No Survival Without Salted Butter
24. Peeter Angelo - We Will Survive
25. Dipwith - Survival In Our Living Room
26. Caiou - Ups and Downs of Self-Subjugation
27. LeÄ… - Level 1 Completed - Congratulations
28. amphobius - Mr Satan's Training Adventure
29. Infu - No other options
30. EMK - Fanfare for the Survival of the Species
31. Christopher Cornell - What Makes It Okay?
32. DJ Clabe - I Barely Survived
33. Whelp - Downfall
34. Lucas Dicus - Beware the Ancient Ruins in the Jungle
35. EXZT - Still Breathing
36. Alexander Mendoza - Crouch 'Till it Hurts
37. Cepukka - Againts a force of two times greater power
38. Don't B Flat - Not Dead Yet
39. Trayzonne - Warmup
40. Paul Mietz Egli - Dusk at the Souk
41. David Olofson - Survival of the Strings
42. AMETHYST - Holding On
43. David Olofson - Survival of the Synth

The Two Hour Album Challenge (2HAC) is a community-driven challenge to collectively start and complete an album of music in two hours. 

At the start of the challenge, a theme is chosen randomly. Each participant then independently (or collaboratively) writes a song with that theme in mind using a strict time limit of two hours. 

This album is free to download, proceeds from album purchases will go to the Angel of Hope animal rescue: www.aohrescue.org 

More information can be found here: 2hac.abstractionmusic.com
data.text: If I get out of here today If I survive Maybe I will live For the rest of my life
